data_variables.name: StandardScaler
data_variables.description: Scikit-learn's method for standardizing features by removing the mean and scaling to unit variance.

data_variables.name: plt
data_variables.description: Matplotlib's pyplot module for creating static, animated, and interactive visualizations in Python.

data_variables.name: np
data_variables.description: NumPy's namespace for linear algebra operations and numerical computations.

data_variables.name: os
data_variables.description: Python's standard library for interacting with the operating system; used for file path manipulations.

data_variables.name: pd
data_variables.description: Pandas' namespace for data processing and handling CSV file input/output.

data_flow.flow: can be used for feature scaling (though not explicitly shown here).
used for all visualizations including histograms, correlation matrices, and scatter plots.
used for numerical operations throughout the plotting functions.
used to check for CSV files in the directory.
used for data processing and analyzing DataFrames.
